partial_progress.details: Phases 1,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,10 completed. Phase 2 (Boneyard cleanup) not started. Sorry-free completeness chain established.

completion_data.completion_summary: Proved sorry-free weak and strong completeness theorems for bimodal TM logic using chain-bundle BMCS construction over CanonicalBC domain with modified truth semantics. All theorems depend only on standard Lean axioms (no sorry, no custom axioms). Key innovation: Box case uses MCS membership directly, requiring temporal coherence only for the evaluated family.
roadmap_items: Prove completeness theorem for bimodal TM logic
